title: Rhubarb bread
ingredients: ['Bread', '225ml (8 fl oz) milk', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225g (8 oz) dark brown soft sugar', '150ml (1/4 pint) vegetable oil', '1 egg', '300g (11 oz) plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '175g (6 oz) chopped rhubarb', '75g (3 oz) chopped walnuts', 'Topping', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon butter, melted']
